sn20.12:1.2: “Assuttha no tumhe, bhikkhave, rattiya paccusasamayam jarasingalassa vassamanassa”ti?
sn20.12:1.4: “Siya kho, bhikkhave, tasmim jarasingale ya kaci katannuta katavedita, na tveva idhekacce sakyaputtiyapatinne siya ya kaci katannuta katavedita.
sn20.12:1.7: na ca no amhesu appakampi katam nassissati’ti.
